Game: Professor Brainium's Games 2008-05-08T00:00:00-07:00 Professor Brainium's Games is an educational video game released exclusively for the Nintendo DS in 2008. The purpose of the game is to inform the player by providing various puzzles, which they must complete to progress further. The game is similar to Brain Age and Big Brain Academy in its format and style of play. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/032471de-baa6-4a28-a6a2-e8ea30db3ae0.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/1c8112f0-3dcc-4531-ae76-989d8a80abff.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/f68bc066-eb1d-467d-ab55-b82f835c0e44.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/428d9cfa-c532-406d-a614-6b64df75a0f6.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Professor_Brainium%27s_Games Puzzle Frontline Studios Bold Games
